page.title: 19HOME LIFE IN GRANGETOWN
page.content: {My typical Saturday - Mary Conway {(mother of two) { I wake at 9a.m., then go downstairs to make myself a cup of coffee. I open the mail and read the morning newspaper. I make my daughter her breakfast; which consists of cereal, toast and tea. After this I have a bath and then get ready to take my daughter to Dance Lessons which begin at 10a.m. My husband picks us up and we do our shopping. When we return home,I stack the food in the pantry and the freezer, and have a sandwich to eat. At about 6p.m.we have Spaghetti for tea. After the dishes have been cleared away I sit down and watch T.V. until 11.30 p.m. Then I go to bed.
